definition.name: Markdown autodocs
definition.description: A github action that automatically format markdown files, sync external docs/src code & make better docs.
definition.author: Dinesh Sonachalam <dineshsonachalam@gmail.com>

inputs.name: commit_author
inputs.description: Value used for the commit author. Defaults to the username of whoever triggered this workflow run.

inputs.name: commit_user_email
inputs.description: Email address used for the commit user

inputs.name: branch
inputs.description: Git branch name, where changes should be pushed too.

inputs.name: categories
inputs.description: Categories to automatically sync or transform its contents in the markdown files.

steps.run: python3 action.py -repo '${{ github.repository }}' -access_token '${{ github.token }}' -commit_author '${{ inputs.commit_author  }}' -commit_user_email '${{ inputs.commit_user_email  }}' -commit_message '${{ inputs.commit_message  }}' -branch '${{ inputs.branch }}' -output_file_paths '${{ inputs.output_file_paths }}' -categories '${{ inputs.categories }}'
